---

## Requirements

* Python 3.6+

* [python-fire](https://github.com/google/python-fire) - command line tool


## Installation

```console
$ pip install ccpp-test
```

## Usage

### Usage 1

```console
$ ccpp-test

NAME
    ccpp-test

SYNOPSIS
    ccpp-test COMMAND

COMMANDS
    COMMAND is one of the following:

     hello
```

### Usage 2

```console
$ ccpp-test hello

Hello, World! I'm guaifish.
```
